name: 3x1 Public Relations
description:
3x1 Group is one of the UK's top independent communications consultancies - one of the few Scottish agencies ranked in PR Week's Top 150 league table and the only one to win Scotland's Outstanding Consultancy of the Year by the CIPR five times since our formation in 2001.
Comprising 3x1 Public Relations, 3x1 Public Affairs and 3x1 Digital, we are the only independent communications group in Scotland to offer integrated public relations, digital marketing and public affairs.
